name: Game Jam Game (meadow-ghost)
description:
48 HOURS

That's all you and your jammer have to make a game.  Your jammer is a great developer - but not so great at taking care of themselves. Make sure they eat food, pet cats, and sleep every once in a while. You'll have to balance their earthly needs against the allure of releasing the best game in the universe.

Try to finish a game by the end of the weekend, or burn out trying.

*Note - Cat has a petting cooldown
